articles.author: Press Trust of India | Posted by: Alfea Jamal
articles.title: Novel coronavirus can survive on skin for 9 hours: Study - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The SARS-CoV-2 virus, which causes Covid-19, may linger on human skin for nine hours, much longer than the flu viruses can, according to a study.  The influenza A virus (IAV), in contrast, remained viable on human skin for nearly two hours.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Why so many COVID positive patients experience no symptoms - Times of India
articles.description: There's another reason why asymptomatic patients are unique to COVID-19- the virus may be making them feel no pain,
